title: Popup Builder - Usage Examples
description: Common usage patterns and example configurations for creating modals, popups, slide panels, and overlay content with multiple trigger options

validationRules: block_id is required and must be unique 4-character hex string
toggleCanvas must be 'button' or 'icon' (determines trigger element)
When toggleCanvas='button': btnText is required
When toggleCanvas='icon': toggleIconStyle required ('style-1', 'style-2', 'style-3', 'custom')
openStyle must be 'popup' (center), 'push', 'slide-along', or 'corner-box'
When openStyle='popup': popupWidth and popupHeight define dimensions
When openStyle='push' or 'slide-along': openDir required ('left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom')
When openStyle='corner-box': cornerBoxDir required ('top-left', 'top-right', etc.)
Trigger conditions (at least one required): onbtnClick, onpageLoad, onScroll, exitInlet, inactivity, pageviews, prevurl, extraclick
When onpageLoad=true: loadpodelay sets delay in milliseconds (default 500)
When onScroll=true: scrollHeight sets percentage 0-100 (default 100)
When exitInlet=true: popup triggers when mouse leaves viewport
When inactivity=true: inactivitySec sets seconds of inactivity (required)
When pageviews=true: pageViews sets number of page views (required)
When prevurl=true: previousUrl.url sets referring URL (required)
When extraclick=true: extraId sets element ID to trigger popup (required)
showRestricted enables frequency limiting with showXTimes and showXDays
showTime enables date range with dateStart and dateEnd (format: 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM')
closeContent controls close button visibility (default true)
bodyClickClose controls click-outside-to-close (default true)
Fixed positioning: fixedToggleBtn requires leftAutoD/rightAutoD and topAutoD/bottomAutoD positioning
Responsive positioning: responsiveT (tablet) and responsiveM (mobile) enable breakpoint-specific positions
inAnimation and outAnimation use CSS animation names (fadeIn, slideInLeft, zoomIn, bounceIn, etc.)
Animation duration: inanimDur and outanimDur ('fast', 'normal', 'slow', 'custom' with custDur/outcustDur)
Custom scrollbar requires scrlBar=true
backendVisi=true hides toggle button on frontend (for auto-triggers only)
warnings: Don't set multiple trigger conditions unless intentional (may cause unexpected behavior)
Don't use onbtnClick=true with backendVisi=true (button won't be visible to click)
exitInlet may not work on mobile devices (no mouse cursor)
showRestricted uses browser localStorage (may not work in private/incognito mode)
Don't set bodyClickClose=false with no closeContent button (user can't close popup)
Fixed positioning (fixedToggleBtn) may overlap content on small screens
Don't use leftAutoD and rightAutoD simultaneously (conflict)
Don't use topAutoD and bottomAutoD simultaneously (conflict)
popupWidth and popupHeight only apply to openStyle='popup' (ignored for slide panels)
openWidth applies to slide panels and corner boxes, not center popups
Corner box direction (cornerBoxDir) is ignored unless openStyle='corner-box'
Custom icon (toggleIconStyle='custom') requires imgSvg.url to be set
closeIconCustom=true requires closeIconCustomSource.url for custom close icon
Overlay blur (openCssfilter) may affect performance on low-end devices
Multiple popups on same page may conflict (use unique block_id)
Animations may not work on browsers without CSS animation support
loadpodelay values <500ms may cause popup to appear before page fully loads
scrollHeight=0 triggers immediately on page load (use onpageLoad instead)
inactivitySec <10 seconds may annoy users (recommend 30+ seconds)
showXTimes=0 disables frequency limiting (shows every time)
dateStart/dateEnd times are in site timezone, not user timezone
extraId must match existing element ID exactly (case-sensitive)
commonMistakes: Setting backendVisi=true with onbtnClick=true (no button to click on frontend)
Forgetting to set trigger condition (popup never shows)
Using exitInlet without showRestricted (annoys users with repeated exit popups)
Setting bodyClickClose=false without close button (popup can't be closed)
Using fixed positioning without testing on mobile (may overlap content)
Not setting openBg=1 before using bgDefaultColor or bgGradient
Forgetting to set openTypography=1 in btnTypo before setting typography values
Using leftAutoD=true and rightAutoD=true simultaneously (positioning conflict)
Setting popupWidth/popupHeight for slide panels (doesn't apply, use openWidth)
Using cornerBoxDir without openStyle='corner-box' (ignored)
Not testing popup triggers (onScroll, exitInlet, etc.) before deploying
Using custom close icon without providing closeIconCustomSource.url
Setting showXTimes without showXDays (frequency limiting incomplete)
Using inactivity trigger without inactivitySec value
Forgetting unit in size values (iconSize needs md and unit: 'px')
Not providing responsive values for button alignment (btnAlign needs md/sm/xs)
Using extraId without extraclick=true (external trigger not enabled)
Setting multiple conflicting animations (inAnimation and custom CSS)
Not testing on all screen sizes (fixed positions may break responsive layout)
Using very large popupWidth on mobile (may overflow viewport)
bestPractices: Always provide a way to close popup (closeContent=true or bodyClickClose=true)
Use frequency limiting (showRestricted) for marketing popups to avoid annoying users
Set reasonable delays for onpageLoad (3-5 seconds minimum)
Test exit intent popups thoroughly (behavior varies across browsers)
Use semantic animations (slideInLeft for left panels, bounceIn for notifications)
Match animation duration to popup size (larger popups = longer duration)
Provide responsive sizing for fixed toggle buttons
Use gradient backgrounds for modern, eye-catching popups
Add shadows to popups for depth and visual separation
Style close buttons to be clearly visible but not overwhelming
Use dark overlay backgrounds (rgba(0,0,0,0.5-0.7)) for center popups
Limit corner box dimensions (300-350px max) to avoid blocking content
Use slide panels for navigation menus and filters
Use center popups for important messages and forms
Use corner boxes for notifications and chat widgets
Set showXDays=7 minimum for exit intent popups (avoid annoying returning users)
Combine multiple trigger conditions for fallback behavior (e.g., extraclick + inactivity)
Use custom scrollbar styling for branded slide panels
Test popups on mobile devices (touch interactions differ from mouse)
Use time-based popups (showTime) for seasonal campaigns
Provide clear call-to-action in popup content
Use URL parameter triggers (calltoUrlpara) for campaign-specific popups
Add hover effects to close buttons for better UX
Use push/slide-along effects for immersive experiences
Keep corner box content concise (limited space)
Use consistent branding (colors, fonts) between popup and site

responsivePatterns.description: Position toggle button at specific coordinates on screen
responsivePatterns.implementation: Set fixedToggleBtn=true, then use leftAutoD/xPosD or rightAutoD/rightPosD for horizontal, topAutoD/yPosD or bottomAutoD/bottomPosD for vertical
responsivePatterns.example: Top-left hamburger: leftAutoD=true, xPosD='20', topAutoD=true, yPosD='20'

responsivePatterns.description: Different toggle positions for tablet and mobile
responsivePatterns.implementation: Enable responsiveT and responsiveM, then use xPosT/yPosT for tablet, xPosM/yPosM for mobile
responsivePatterns.example: Desktop top-left (20,20), Tablet top-right, Mobile center top

responsivePatterns.description: Make trigger button full width on small screens
responsivePatterns.implementation: Use btnrespo=true, then btnmoFull=true for mobile full width, btntabFull=true for tablet
responsivePatterns.example: Desktop centered button, mobile full-width bottom sticky

responsivePatterns.description: Adjust popup dimensions for different screen sizes
responsivePatterns.implementation: Use responsive units in popupWidth/popupHeight (md/sm/xs breakpoints)

accessibilityNotes: Ensure close buttons are keyboard accessible (native button elements)
Provide ARIA labels for toggle buttons and close buttons
Use semantic HTML in popup content (headings, paragraphs, lists)
Ensure sufficient color contrast for text and buttons (WCAG AA: 4.5:1)
Test keyboard navigation (Tab, Escape key to close)
Provide focus trap within popup (don't allow tabbing outside)
Announce popup opening to screen readers (role='dialog', aria-modal='true')
Use descriptive button text (not just 'Click Here' or 'Open')
Ensure close button is visible and large enough (min 44x44px tap target)
Provide alternative to exit intent for keyboard users (can't trigger with mouse)
performanceConsiderations: Minimize popup content size (lazy load images, defer heavy scripts)
Use CSS animations instead of JavaScript for smooth 60fps performance
Avoid blur filters (openCssfilter) on low-end devices (GPU intensive)
Limit number of popups per page (1-2 maximum recommended)
Use frequency limiting (showRestricted) to reduce localStorage operations
Optimize overlay background (solid colors perform better than gradients)
Defer non-critical popup content until popup opens
Use will-change CSS hint for animated elements (but remove after animation)
Test popup performance on mobile devices (slower CPUs)
Avoid auto-playing videos in popups (bandwidth and performance impact)
